attributes.action: Strip the disgraced former BHS boss Philip Greene of his knighthood.
attributes.background: Former BHS boss Philip Green has cost 11,000 jobs and has caused a pension defecit of $571 million. His net worth is $5.7 billion USD and yet he is sat on his £100 million pound yacht doing nothing. He simply does not deserve a knighthood and should be stripped and publicly humiliated.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
